lines.text: I've said it a hundred times. How can a boy survive that long, six years in the jungle alone?

Now let me tell you something, Mr. Tarzan. I was only fifteen when my dad and I covered the Alaska earthquake. It was I who found the Silk Stocking Killer in Paris, and got his exclusive story, while the entire police department was out looking for him. I can take care of myself.
Well that's great, because I don't want that responsibility.
You're a chief now, Buhara. And laws are important. But when a law is wrong, our chiefs try to change it.
Your mother would have wanted you to go back, Erik. Back to her world. Then one day, when you're old enough and if you really want to, you cam come back here. As I did.
My father, he knew all about rocks. Many kinds of rocks. I can remember that.
He was a geologist. Would you like to be like your father, Erik?
Yes, I would be very proud.
The jungle is no place for a woman.
